title: Keepers of Men: Second Edition. A Dystopian, Epic Novel
description: "Penned by author and active duty Marine major Eric J. Martindale,Keepers of Men drags the reader to a twisted dystopian world of empty hollow. Set in 2028, America has become a barren wasteland of corruption and tyranny. Cameras line the streets, separatists are hunted like dogs, and a dark evil rules the hearts of men. While most blindly accept this world of ashen gray, a few choose freedom over chains, surviving in wilderness enclaves as fugitives of the state. This genre-bending epic novel is sure to be a classic, fusing science fiction, drama, action, and horror. After free-falling desperately through Martindale's dark future, you will never view the present the same. Keepers of Men has been called "our generation's 1984" and "the next Hunger Games". It is listed as a Goodreads Popular Complex Plot Book, ranks number one on Listopia's Near Future Science Fiction List, and is ranked on Listopia's Distopia, Smart Dystopian and Post-Apocalyptic Fiction, Best Christian Science Fiction, and Best Book Covers of 2015 Lists. This heart-stopping post-apocalyptic thriller will drag you in to a darker future than you could have ever dreamed of, so enter at your own risk. Buy your copy of Keepers of Men today. Your tomorrow will never be the same."
author: Eric Martindale
